metadata.title: CVE-2024-44983 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: flowtable: validate vlan headerEnsure there is sufficient room to access the protocol field of theVLAN header, validate it once before the flowtable lookup.=====================================================BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in nf_flow_offload_inet_hook+0x45a/0x5f0net/netfilter/nf_flow_table_inet.c:32 nf_flow_offload_inet_hook+0x45a/0x5f0net/netfilter/nf_flow_table_inet.c:32 nf_hook_entry_hookfn include/linux/netfilter.h:154 [inline] nf_hook_slow+0xf4/0x400 net/netfilter/core.c:626 nf_hook_ingress include/linux/netfilter_netdev.h:34 [inline] nf_ingress net/core/dev.c:5440 [inline]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.11.0-7-generic - 6.11.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-7-generic - 6.11.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-7-generic-64k - 6.11.0-7.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-aws - 6.11.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1003-azure - 6.11.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1001-gcp - 6.11.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-lowlatency - 6.11.0-1002.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-lowlatency-64k - 6.11.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-oracle - 6.11.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.11.0-1003-raspi - 6.11.0-1003.3
No subscription required
